name: IXOLIT
description:
IXOLIT is an equity-financed IT company operating worldwide. In Austria and the USA, high-skilled experts focus on high-traffic managed infrastructure projects and individual software development solutions.
As an international full-service IT provider, we offer comprehensive consultation and generate customized solutions based on the individual customer needs. Our extensive portfolio supplies all-in-one solutions as well as individual services for complex web projects.
Our customers have to deal with high-traffic projects with millions of visits per day. Hence, it is our daily business to offer innovative and efficient state-of-the-art solutions to ensure 100% availability, speed and security of your customers' systems.
